description: "Big Phil" has resigned as EU trade commissioner after a golf dinner sparked coronavirus controversy.
title: Profile: Phil Hogan
maintext: Minister for Agriculture Dara Calleary and Jerry Buttimer, the leas-chathaoirleach (deputy chairman) of the Irish senate both resigned following the revelations surrounding the dinner attended by more than 80 people, which may have been in breach of Covid-19 regulations.
